summary: Hey! This is just a quick retexture of the Blades Katana to give it a more stealthy feeling, it works well with \"Nightingale Prime.\" The blade is also given a darker look. The sheath is also changed to make it darker with a silver tip to match Nightingale.
descriptionHtml:
FOR THOSE WHO WANT TO REPLACE THE NIGHTINGALE BLADE, REFER TO MY OTHER MOD:
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3921

Hey! This is just a quick retexture of the Blades Katana to give it a more stealthy feeling, it works well with \"Nightingale Prime.\" I also use a mod to increase the damage to the same damage as a Daedric Sword. Below are the are the mod links. 

One file has the jagged black texture version, the other one eliminates the jaggedness to give the sword a stealthier look.

NOTE: Because the \"Dragonbane\" uses the same texture path, the Dragonbane blade will look like this as well.

To get this weapon, go to your console by hitting the \"~\" key. Then type in:
player.additem 3AEB9 1

Alternatively, this sword can be retrieved from [SPOILER START] Skyhaven Temple during the main quest in one of the chests. [SPOILER END].
 
Nightingale Prime: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1896
Blades Sword Damage Increase: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2362

If anyone would like to retexture this, you are welcome, just credit me!
If anyone has any suggestions to future color textures just mention it. I am also planning to make this a standalone when the CK comes out, giving it stats that contribute to a light armored/stealth/thief/archer gameplay style.




---------------------------------------------INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS-----------------------------------------------------
Just copy \"textures\" into the data folder in your Skyrim directory.



Credits: Inspiration for the blade part was from ababuobi.
author: Snoopy

files.name: Stealthy Blades Katana - Less jagged black marks on blade
